skill.name: calm
skill.off_msg_char: You have lost your peace of mind.

skill.name: detect evil
skill.off_msg_char: The red in your vision disappears.

skill.name: detect good
skill.off_msg_char: The gold in your vision disappears.

skill.name: detect hidden
skill.off_msg_char: You feel less aware of your surroundings.

skill.name: detect invis
skill.off_msg_char: You no longer see invisible objects.

skill.name: faerie fire
skill.off_msg_char: The pink aura around you fades away.

skill.name: fly
skill.off_msg_char: You slowly float to the ground.

skill.name: infravision
skill.off_msg_char: You no longer see in the dark.

skill.name: sanctuary
skill.off_msg_char: The white aura around your body fades.

skill.name: shield
skill.off_msg_char: Your force shield shimmers then fades away.

skill.name: berserk
skill.off_msg_char: You feel your pulse slow down.

skill.name: dirt kicking
skill.off_msg_char: You rub the dirt out of your eyes.
